name: GetTrailers
description: Finds movies and trailers similar to a given trailer.

maxOfficialRating.description: Optional filter by maximum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

hasThemeSong.description: Optional filter by items with theme songs.

hasThemeVideo.description: Optional filter by items with theme videos.

hasSubtitles.description: Optional filter by items with subtitles.

hasSpecialFeature.description: Optional filter by items with special features.

hasTrailer.description: Optional filter by items with trailers.

adjacentTo.description: Optional. Return items that are siblings of a supplied item.

parentIndexNumber.description: Optional filter by parent index number.

hasParentalRating.description: Optional filter by items that have or do not have a parental rating.

isHd.description: Optional filter by items that are HD or not.

is4K.description: Optional filter by items that are 4K or not.

locationTypes.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on LocationType. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

excludeLocationTypes.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on the LocationType. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

isMissing.description: Optional filter by items that are missing episodes or not.

isUnaired.description: Optional filter by items that are unaired episodes or not.

minCommunityRating.description: Optional filter by minimum community rating.

minCriticRating.description: Optional filter by minimum critic rating.

minPremiereDate.description: Optional. The minimum premiere date. Format = ISO.

minDateLastSaved.description: Optional. The minimum last saved date. Format = ISO.

minDateLastSavedForUser.description: Optional. The minimum last saved date for the current user. Format = ISO.

maxPremiereDate.description: Optional. The maximum premiere date. Format = ISO.

hasOverview.description: Optional filter by items that have an overview or not.

hasImdbId.description: Optional filter by items that have an imdb id or not.

hasTmdbId.description: Optional filter by items that have a tmdb id or not.

hasTvdbId.description: Optional filter by items that have a tvdb id or not.

excludeItemIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered by excluding item ids. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

startIndex.description: Optional. The record index to start at. All items with a lower index will be dropped from the results.

limit.description: Optional. The maximum number of records to return.

recursive.description: When searching within folders, this determines whether or not the search will be recursive. true/false.

searchTerm.description: Optional. Filter based on a search term.

parentId.description: Specify this to localize the search to a specific item or folder. Omit to use the root.

fields.description: Optional. Specify additional fields of information to return in the output. This allows multiple, comma delimited. Options: Budget, Chapters, DateCreated, Genres, HomePageUrl, IndexOptions, MediaStreams, Overview, ParentId, Path, People, ProviderIds, PrimaryImageAspectRatio, Revenue, SortName, Studios, Taglines.

excludeItemTypes.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on item type. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

filters.description: Optional. Specify additional filters to apply. This allows multiple, comma delimited. Options: IsFolder, IsNotFolder, IsUnplayed, IsPlayed, IsFavorite, IsResumable, Likes, Dislikes.

isFavorite.description: Optional filter by items that are marked as favorite, or not.

mediaTypes.description: Optional filter by MediaType. Allows multiple, comma delimited.

imageTypes.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on those containing image types. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

sortBy.description: Optional. Specify one or more sort orders, comma delimited. Options: Album, AlbumArtist, Artist, Budget, CommunityRating, CriticRating, DateCreated, DatePlayed, PlayCount, PremiereDate, ProductionYear, SortName, Random, Revenue, Runtime.

isPlayed.description: Optional filter by items that are played, or not.

genres.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on genre. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

officialRatings.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on OfficialRating. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

tags.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on tag. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

years.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on production year. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

imageTypeLimit.description: Optional, the max number of images to return, per image type.

enableImageTypes.description: Optional. The image types to include in the output.

person.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person.

personIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person id.

personTypes.description: Optional. If specified, along with Person, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified person and PersonType. Allows multiple, comma-delimited.

studios.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on studio. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

artists.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on artists. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

excludeArtistIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on artist id. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

artistIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified artist id.

albumArtistIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified album artist id.

contributingArtistIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered to include only those containing the specified contributing artist id.

albums.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on album. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

albumIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on album id. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

ids.description: Optional. If specific items are needed, specify a list of item id's to retrieve. This allows multiple, comma delimited.

videoTypes.description: Optional filter by VideoType (videofile, dvd, bluray, iso). Allows multiple, comma delimited.

minOfficialRating.description: Optional filter by minimum official rating (PG, PG-13, TV-MA, etc).

isLocked.description: Optional filter by items that are locked.

isPlaceHolder.description: Optional filter by items that are placeholders.

hasOfficialRating.description: Optional filter by items that have official ratings.

collapseBoxSetItems.description: Whether or not to hide items behind their boxsets.

minWidth.description: Optional. Filter by the minimum width of the item.

minHeight.description: Optional. Filter by the minimum height of the item.

maxWidth.description: Optional. Filter by the maximum width of the item.

maxHeight.description: Optional. Filter by the maximum height of the item.

is3D.description: Optional filter by items that are 3D, or not.

seriesStatus.description: Optional filter by Series Status. Allows multiple, comma delimited.

nameStartsWithOrGreater.description: Optional filter by items whose name is sorted equally or greater than a given input string.

nameStartsWith.description: Optional filter by items whose name is sorted equally than a given input string.

nameLessThan.description: Optional filter by items whose name is equally or lesser than a given input string.

studioIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on studio id. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

genreIds.description: Optional. If specified, results will be filtered based on genre id. This allows multiple, pipe delimited.

enableTotalRecordCount.description: Optional. Enable the total record count.

enableImages.description: Optional, include image information in output.

ItemFields.description: Used to control the data that gets attached to DtoBaseItems.

$ul: **StartIndex**: The index of the first record in Items.
**TotalRecordCount**: The total number of records available.
